summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2011 NISSAN ROGUE. WHILE DRIVING 70 MPH, THE VEHICLE DECELERATED RAPIDLY WITHOUT WARNING. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO GATES NISSAN OF RICHMOND, KENTUCKY WHERE THE TRANSMISSION WAS REPLACED; HOWEVER, THE DEALER STATED THAT THE FAILURE WOULD NOT BE FULLY RESOLVED UNTIL A COOLER WAS PLACED INSIDE THE TRANSMISSION. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE AND STATED THAT THE PART NEEDED (COOLER) WAS NOT INCLUDED IN THE EXTENDED WARRANTY OF THE VEHICLE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 106,000.
